FuncDef:
The role master command configures a node as a master.
The undo role command deletes the role configuration.
By default, a node does not belong to any role in the port extension system.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Nodes in the port extension system have two roles: master and AP. A master establishes a channel, delivers a service, forwards traffic, and manages connected APs. After port extension is enabled, run the role master command to configure a node as a master.
Prerequisites
Virtual access port extension has been enabled using the port-extend command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After the role master command is run, all local physical interfaces become four-dimensional interfaces. For example, dimension 1 in GigabitEthernet 1/1/0/1 indicates that the interface is a local interface. If a large number of interfaces and services exist on a device, a long time is taken for running this command and the configuration to take effect.
